H0.text: who is the character of santa claus based on. Saint Nicholas

H1.text: who is the character of santa claus based on. Odin

H2.text: who is the character of santa claus based on. Kris Kringle

H3.text: who is the character of santa claus based on. Wodan

A4.text: Santa Claus evolved from Dutch traditions regarding Saint Nicholas (Sinterklaas).

A5.text: When the Dutch established the colony of New Amsterdam, they brought the legend and traditions of Sinterklaas with them.
